name: Knightmare (itch) (urbi_et_urbi, bwuz)
description:
Move: W A S D

Attack: Left Mouse Click

Knightmare is a Rouglike game where you explore dungeons filled with orcs.

Every room holds a different challenge. Meet your Fate and plunge into the Unknown.

Pathfinding: https://arongranberg.com/astar/
